page.title: 18My Den
page.content: Behind my house on Little Meadow is a large area of waste ground-well it's not really waste as it is owned by {Knappe Cross House}which is an old house used as a pub and restaurant. On Saturdays and in the holidays I call for my friends Georgina and Matthew and we push through the hole we have made in the hedge. We always put some flowers on the grave of a blackbird which died in front of our very eyes. The den we are making is built of old sheets of tin and scrap wood. I don't know where it comes from as nobody is supposed to dump rubbish there. We have invented lots of secret whistles and calls so we know who is coming and we have a trip-wire which fires a wooden spear if it is one of our enemies! Other people go to our den and I suppose we will get there one day and find it wrecked.
